LinkPotentialImpl< Interaction > Class Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class McMd::LinkPotentialImpl< Interaction >

Template implementation of an BondPotential for links.

A LinkPotential implements the BondPotential interface, and uses an instance of a bond interaction class, but uses the LinkMaster of the parent System to identify linked atoms.

Definition at line 39 of file LinkPotentialImpl.h.

#include <LinkPotentialImpl.h>

Member Function Documentation

void readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read potential energy.

This method reads the bond potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Interaction::readParam(), it passes simulation().nBondType() to Interaction::setNBondType().

Reimplemented from ParamComposite.
